name: 1Bit Rythm
description:
1BitRhythm

Game about following the rhythm as long as possible.

Controls & Manual

Start by entering your name.

Hit Enter.

Choose a color palette.

Start game by tapping the spacebar multiple times.

Choose rhythm speed by pressing a number of times.

2 taps = 80 bpm.

3 taps = 120 bpm

4 taps = 160 bpm

...

The game will then start blinking in the rhythm four times.

Continue the rhythm by pressing spacebar.

Hold the rhythm for as long as possible.

See your score here:

http://dreamlo.com/lb/5725130e6e51b60440d7bb1e/pip...

(The first two things are your name and score, rest is date etc.)

Thanks for playing!

<3
